visa_devices module¶

class src.visa_devices.HP83508(_rm, _path)¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for HP83508 RF-source functions. Open a resource from the _ID string and the resource manager _RM and save the resource object to ID.

Parameters

  • _rm (pyvisa.ResourceManager) – resource manager for the HP83508 visa device

  • _path (str) – config-file for setting the name and the limits of the device.

Raises

yaml.YAMLError – if the config file cannot be read properly

setF(_f) → None¶

Takes a desired set-frequency and sends it to the device.

Parameters

_f (float) – set frequency in GHz

setP(_p) → None¶

Takes a desired set-power and sends it to the device.

Parameters

_p (float) – set power in dBm

class src.visa_devices.NIUSB6259¶

Bases: object

Wrapper for the NI USB6259 DAQ card.

__format_channel(_dev, _ch) → str¶

Compose a string for passing to the nidaqmx-API functions from the device ID and the channel name.

Parameters

  • _dev (str) – device name

  • _ch (str) – channel name

Returns

[description]

Return type

str

__get_add_channel(_type='ai')¶

Returns the appropriate function for adding a channel to the task based on the type of the channel.

Parameters

_type (str, optional) – type of the channel to add. Defaults to ‘ai’.

Returns

appropriate fuction for adding the channel

Return type

func

add_channels(_dev, _ch, _type='ai') → None¶

Contents are added as voltage_channels of the specified type to the device.

Parameters

  • _dev (str) – device name

  • _ch (str, dict, list) – channels can be string, dictionary or list!

  • _type (str, optional) – channel type. Defaults to ‘ai’.

analog_read_n(_s, _t) → numpy.array¶

Read _S numbers of samples from the configured input channels with timeout _T and return them in an array.

Parameters

  • _s (int) – number of samples

  • _t (int) – timeout (s)

Returns

[description]

Return type

np.array

analog_write(_arr) → None¶

Write the array to the specified output channel.

Parameters

_arr (array) – output array

config_clk(_dev, _ch, _r, _t=1000, _m=TaskMode.TASK_COMMIT) → None¶

For a clock channel, set the sample rate _R (Hz) for device _DEV at channel _CH. Sets the implicit timing _T (=sample number per channel) and task mode _M as well.

Parameters

  • _dev (str) – device name

  • _ch (str) – channel name

  • _r (float) – sample rate (Hz)

  • _t (int, optional) – sample number per channel. Defaults to 1000.

  • _m (nidaqmx.Task.TaskMode, optional) – clock task mode. Defaults to TaskMode.TASK_COMMIT.

config_sample_clk(_r, _trig, _edge, _s, _m=AcquisitionType.FINITE) → None¶

Configure the the trigger and clock for IO-channels of task self.task.

Parameters

  • _r (float) – sample rate (Hz)

  • _trig (str) – trigger source channel

  • _edge (nidaqmx.Edge) – e.g. RISING or FALLING

  • _s (int) – number of samples

  • _m (nidaqmx.constants.AquisitionType, optional) – finite or continuous. Defaults to constants.AcquisitionType.FINITE.

set_trigger(_dev, _ch) → None¶
start() → None¶

Start a task.
